cases.user_story:
Given I am on the Apple website
 When I view the latest Macbook Pro
 Then I should be able to view the page to compare macbooks

Given I am on the amazon website
 When I navigate to the Sign In page
 Then I should see the sign in page

Given I am on the {{amazon_product_page}} page
 When I click on the customer reviews link
 Then I should see the customer reviews

Given I am on the {{amazon_product_page}} page
 and I click on the 'Add to Cart' button
 Then I should see the product added to the cart

Given I am on the Amazon website
 when I searched for Xbox Wireless Controller
 Then I can open the first product and see the details

Feature: Lasagna page
 Given I am on the {{vegie_lasagna_page}} page 
 and scrolled two times down
 Then I should see the ingredients list

Feature: Search and view Lasagna
 Given I have searched for 'vegeratian lasagna'
 and clicked on the reciped named 'Easy Vegentaria Spinach Lasagna'
 Then I should see the recipe details including the name 'Easy Vegentaria Spinach Lasagna'

Feature: Vegetarian Lasagna Search
 Given I am on the Allrecipes website
    When I search for 'vegetarian lasagna'
    Then I should see a list of recipes
    And at least one recipe should have more than 100 reviews
    And the rating should be at least 4.5 stars
